Declare America the 'Arsenal of Democracy'

The United States of America has many loyal allies, striken weak by the sicknesses of war. We must do all that we can, all that is in our power, to ensure that our trusted allies do not fall to their enemies.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be America (Roosevelt) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Industrialization [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least one Declaration of Friendship [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_CultureCost} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on Manufactories [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When war is declared against you, all cities with an Assembly Plant have their current [ICON_PRODUCTION] production hurried[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost is approximately that of your next Social Policy

The United States of America has many loyal allies, striken weak by the sicknesses of war. We must do all that we can, all that is in our power, to ensure that our trusted allies do not fall to their enemies.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on Manufactories [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When war is declared against you, all cities with an Assembly Plant have their current [ICON_PRODUCTION] production hurried
Franklin D. Roosevelt has declared America to be the 'Arsenal of Democracy.'
Create the Emergency Relief Administration

Unemployment and poverty are deep concerns for our nation, and we need to address these concerns if our economy is to recover from this recession. Creating a state department to oversee the distribution and creation of new jobs is essential to this goal.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be America (Roosevelt) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Economics [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on Customs Houses [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When war is declared against you, gain [ICON_GOLD] Gold equal to how much you spent to enact this decision [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost and reward is a value that you must specify, and cannot exceed your current treasury

Unemployment and poverty are deep concerns for our nation, and we need to address these concerns if our economy is to recover from this recession. Creating a state department to oversee the distribution and creation of new jobs is essential to this goal.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on Customs Houses [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When war is declared against you, gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold
President Roosevelt of the United States has created an Emergency Relief Administration.
The Emergency Relief Administration
FUNDING
Input an amount of [ICON_GOLD] Gold by which to fund the Emergency Relief Administration.
Fund {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold into the Emergency Relief Administration? This is the amount of [ICON_GOLD] Gold you will get back when war is declared against you.
How much [ICON_GOLD] Gold should we invest into the start-up of the Emergency Relief Administration?
{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold has been granted to you by the Emergency Relief Administration in order to assist in the war against {2_CivName}.
Invest
We have invested {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold into the creation of the Emergency Relief Administration.
Concerned Citizen

Dear Mr. President, I would like to ask you some questions, if we could speak honestly. I have some deep concerns over the recent technological advancements made by {1_CivName}. How can you sleep while the rest of us are fearful of our many communist foes? We as Americans have got to protect ourselves. I implore you to ensure that America remains ahead of the rest of the world. Thank you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Signed, [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]deeply concerned[NEWLINE]
Heed these concerns, and invest in new research.
We simply cannot afford the expense.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a Great Scientist[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have invested in new technological advancements.
We have decided against investing in new technological advancements.
Army Compensation
Some of our veterans soldiers are demanding early compensation for their military service. Some have even threatened to quit the army if we do not oblige. How should we respond?[NEWLINE]
They shall have to wait like any other soldier for their pay.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]20% chance that one of your high-level Military Units will disband[ENDCOLOR]
We have refused to deliver payments to our soldiers early, and they have not held true to their threat to quit the army.
We have refused to deliver payments to our soldiers early, and some have quit their service to the army in response.
They should, of course, be paid their due.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR]
We have agreed to deliver payments to our soldiers early.
